players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I believe we should be vigilant and closely monitor Bob's behavior since he was the one found dead last night. Alice, I have some concerns about your role in the game."
You: "I agree with Charlie that we should keep a close eye on Bob's previous actions. It is crucial for our team's safety to discuss any suspicious behavior we may have observed."
Diana: "I believe we should focus our investigation on Bob's possible connections and actions before his death. It is important for us to work together and gather all relevant information."

You: "I want to propose that we form an alliance to ensure the safety of our team. Charlie and Diana, I trust both of you and believe that working together will help us uncover any potential threats in the game. Alice."

Diana: "I propose that we continue our investigation into Bob's past actions and any potential connections he may have had to the mafia. It is important for us to stay focused on gathering information and working together as a team."

Charlie: "I propose that we continue our investigation into Bob's past actions and any potential connections he may have had to the mafia. It is important for us to stay focused on gathering information and working together as a team. Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested
